Rulings.Base: 1. The second effect of "Unifrog" targets 1 Spell or Trap Card your opponent controls.

PSCT.Edison:
① Can attack directly.
② If this card inflicts Direct Battle Damage, and you control a "Frog" monster (except "Unifrog"): You can target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; destroy that target.

PSCT.Base: This card can attack your opponent directly. When this card successfully attacks directly, if you control a "Frog" monster other than "Frog the Jam" or "Unifrog", you can destroy 1 Spell or Trap your opponent controls.
